nodes.text: The Crimson Days was a conflict that was fought in the Senex sector.

The conflict was instigated in 553 BBY when the warlord Osted Picutorion married Farasa Anturi, a deranged princess from the aristocratic Senex house House Anturi. The house was renamed "House Picutorion" and the rival Senex houses House Vandron and House Petro attacked Picutorion, although their combined forces were defeated. Picutorion then liberated the planet Hutlar, freeing the Hutlarians from servitude to the Senex lords; and occupied the planet Karfeddion. The conflicted was ended by the Third Nantama Synod, which accepted Picutorion's marriage and the independence of Hutlar.
